item.title: Dungeons and Dragons Campaign
item.content:encoded:
I wanted to play online, but I preferred the text-based type to the online game, so I figured it would be quite logical for such a game to be played on a forum. Therefore…

I only have the 3.5 rules, and would prefer to use them, but if you want to use other rules feel free to make your own thread ;)
Of those, I only have the 3 core rules (DM guide, PC handbook, Monster Manual)

Oh, and although I'm organising it, I'm fine being a PC. Either way is fine with me, it's just me being a PC might be easier what with not having all the rules.
I have a few links to sites with DnD information, and could probably convert them from 4e to 3.5

So… yeah, post if you're interested.
